titleStmt.title: Englands vvelcome to Iames by the grace of God, King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, defender of the faith, &c. Wherein is shewed her zealous loue, and reuerent dutie to her soueraigne. Composed into three cantoes.
Englands welcome to James.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Englands welcome to King Iames.
STC 14362.5 bound in following quire A.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
With: The copie of the K. Maiesties letter to the l. maior of the citie of London, and to the aldermen and commons of the same. [London : R. Barker, 1603].
